attributes.action: Change the sentence for Anjem Choudry as 5 1/2 years is too lenient
attributes.background: This man has done his best to promote hatred toward British citizens, promoted a terrorist organisation and tried to recruit for a terrorist organisation. The sentence handed to him is too lenient and needs to be reconsidered. This man is a danger to the British people and national security

rejection.details:
Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low, and only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
